ROBERT F. SCHENKKAN
Director
May 31, 1962
Mr. William Harley
NAEB Headquarters
DuPont Circle Office Building
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
As well as I understand your description of May 25th of the ExperiÂ¬
mental TV Production project, I approve. '*1 would approve even more
if proposal number 1 included the possibility of sub-contract by NAEB
members, and if project number 2 also had contained the possibility of
production by NAEB members.M I recognize the difficulties inherent in
both of these proposed changes and would find the original proposal
acceptable if these are not feasible.
Best personal regards.
